publication.title: Fast Training of SVM via Morphological Clustering for Color Image Segmentation
On-line Training of Neural Network for Color Image Segmentation
Health monitoring of a shaft transmission system via hybrid models of PCR and PLS
publication.jconf: SIAM International Conference on Data Mining
publication.keyword: Health Monitoring;Hybrid Model;Information System;Latent Variable;Multivariate Regression;Partial Least Square;Partial Least Square Regression;Principal Component;Principal Component Regression;
publication.abstract: Prediction of motor shaft misalignment is essential for the development of effective coupling and rotating equipment maintenance information systems. It can be stated as a multivariate regression problem with ill-posed data. In this paper, hybrid models of principal components regression (PCR) and partial least squares regression (PLS) have been proposed for this problem. The basic idea of hybrid models is
